column4: hello folks... I have a problem booting, processes freeze, a kind of weird dialogue for restoration is being called, but has no permitions, can't get to logon, splash freezes and echoes "ubuntu is running in low graphics mode, error: no /something/fs0 directory found"...

kubuntu boot splash crashes, switching to low graphics mode, with an error message that some directory /???/fs0 can't be open, because doesnt exist... i have to switch to an other TTY, press ctrl c and use prompt... then, I'm allowed to start xserver actually...
Hmmm not sure what fs0 is as a device without looking hang on
